meanings.definition: The head of the Roman Catholic Church.
meanings.sent1: The popes lead the Roman Catholic Church.
meanings.sent2: Many people look up to the popes for guidance.
meanings.sent3: The popes had a race to see who would reach the Vatican first.
meanings.sent4: In history, the popes have been the pillars of the Catholic faith.
meanings.sent5: The popes wear distinctive hats called miters.

meanings.sent1: There are multiple popes in the Vatican.
meanings.sent2: The cardinals gathered to elect the new popes.
meanings.sent3: The popes decided to have a picnic in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The popes stood together like a row of statues.
meanings.sent5: The popes' robes fluttered in the wind as they walked.
